TEXT.TITLE: CATO CORP <CACOA> SETS INITIAL DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Cato Corp, which went public April 30, said its board declared an initial quarterly dividend as a public company of two cts per share, payable June 26 to holders of record June 12. Reuter
